Comment: Actual footage of a U.S. president pushing Netanyahu on Gaza:  President: “Bibi, please let one (1) food truck go into Gaza, the people are starving.”  Bibi: “Lol no.”  President: “Okie dokie, here’s another shipment of bombs. It would really suck if you used this to blow up a cancer hospital, maybe don’t do that.”  Bibi: *blows up a cancer hospital*  Rinse and repeat.

Comment: Of all the atrocities committed by governments throughout history, the use of hunger as a weapon against a population is particularly cruel and never justified. I am sympathetic towards Israel for many reasons, but this policy is wrong and should be discouraged by sanctions.
Author: Minguseyes
